attributes.additional_details: Ensure the safety, heritage and tradition of all classic vehicles over 20 years old with a rolling date going forward.
attributes.background: Ban the conversion of any car over 20 years old, classics and vintage, including cars classed as prototype using a classic bodyshell or chassis to be converted to electric only powered propulsion.

rejection.details: It is up to individual car owners, not the Government or House of Commons, to decide what modifications to make to their vehicles, provided they still meet rules on roadworthiness.
